ygData.subject: Necros use runes right?
ygData.msgSnippet: Just made level 16 with my necromancer, Flarfian and am interested in researching Banshee Aura.  Checking the neat site: http://www.mythiran.com/ and viewing
ygData.messageBody:
Just made level 16 with my necromancer, Flarfian and am interested in
researching Banshee Aura. Checking the neat site:
http://www.mythiran.com/

and viewing this file:
http://members.xoom.com/_XOOM/ThStorm/necro.htm

I see the following text:
This is the COMPLETE list of research spells and ingredients for necros.
This list is courtesy of Azrael. Thanks Az. It is supposed to be a complete
list and all ingredients listed are Words. Also, the Az had a few comments
and disclaimers to add:

I was under the impression that necros use Runes for their research
components but this page specifies all the components will be Words. Then
down below in the Banshee Aura spell it lists Derivation and Eradication.
Is this correct?

I'm interested in going through the motions of learning the languages to
read the recipe books but want to at least know I'm on the right path before
wasting components.

PS I'm on the Povar server and would be interested in buying either of the
components needs or a finished scroll 8) Also, I would be happy to grab
any of the enchant metal scrolls from Neriak if there are enchanters who
can't get in there.

thanks,
Shawn
Flarfian, lvl 16 dark elf necro
Darmok, lvl 15 troll shaman
Azara, lvl 8 high elf enchanter
Bertt, lvl 12 barbarian warrior
